message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"I'm sorry; excuse me.","sentence":"对不起，我来晚了。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a person (gender neutral, simple cartoon-like) entering a room where another person is waiting. The first person looks apologetic, with head slightly bowed and a hand raised in apology. The room has a subtle, gentle post-apocalyptic touch – soft glows, slightly overgrown plants peeking through windows, and warm, muted colors. The mood is gentle and sincere, emphasizing the act of apology.","sentence_translation":"Sorry, I came late."}
